John Samuel Mbiti (30 November 1931 – 5 October 2019) was a Kenyan-born Christian religious philosopher and writer. He was an ordained Anglican priest, and a canon.
Mbiti is an Emeritus professor at the University of Bern and parish minister to the town of Burgdorf, Switzerland.
Mbiti died at a nursing home in Burgdorf, Switzerland on 5 October 2019 at the age of 87.
